thread.title: 'I salute cardboard cut-out of president every day' says supporter invited onstage by Trump
thread.title_full: 'I salute cardboard cut-out of president every day' says supporter invited onstage by Trump

author: Adam Boult
title: 'I salute cardboard cut-out of president every day' says supporter invited onstage by Trump
text:
News 'I salute cardboard cut-out of president every day' says supporter invited onstage by Trump Donald Trump hugs supporter Gene Huber after inviting his onstage to speak during a "Make America Great Again" rally in Florida Credit: REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Adam Boult 19 February 2017 ‚Ä¢ 9:39am 
D onald Trump appeared to cause a minor panic among his Secret Service bodyguards during a rally on Saturday when he invited a supporter up on stage with him. 
The president had seen Gene Huber on television earlier in the day, speaking to reporters as he queued up to get into the rally in Melbourne, Florida. 
After spotting Mr Huber in the crowd, Mr Trump invited him to jump over the barrier and join him at the podium. However, Mr Huber had a little trouble getting past security, who tried to bar his way before the President told them to let him though. . @POTUS brings a supporter up on stage with him, who speaks to the crowd: "Mr. President, thank you sir." pic.twitter.com/WznLzzUxMn ‚Äî Fox News (@FoxNews) February 18, 2017 
M r Huber, it transpired, is a Trump super-fan. Speaking to CNN after his surprise turn in the spotlight, he claimed he has a 6ft cardboard cutout of the president that he salutes "every single day." Everyday he talks to a 6 foot cardboard President Trump. You couldn't make this stuff up #trumprally #theresistance #genehuber pic.twitter.com/PQU5F0YYQM ‚Äî Jonathan Beeley üîπ (@foreignpolicy77) February 19, 2017 
‚ÄúThis guy,‚Äù the president told the crowd as Mr Huber, a car salesman from Boynton Beach, came up on stage. ‚ÄúSo, he‚Äôs been all over television saying the best things, and I see him standing. Didn‚Äôt you get here at 4 in the morning? Say a couple of words to this crowd.‚Äù God Bless Gene Huber, voice of Trump supporters all across America! Was just interviewed by CNN! HE TOLD THEM, BE NICE TO TRUMP! #MAGA ! pic.twitter.com/064oaLFcfU ‚Äî Lynn Ratner (@RatnerLynn) February 19, 2017 
M r Huber, wearing a President Donald Trump T-shirt, took the microphone and said, ‚ÄúMr. President, thank you, sir. We the people, our movement is the reason why our president of the United States is standing here in front of us today. When President Trump during the election promised all these things that he was going to do for us, I knew he was going to do this for us.‚Äù 
Trump's decision to invite a member of the public up on stage went down well with supporters - but doubts have been raised over whether it was a spontaneous move, or had in fact been planned in advance. 
Mr Huber's social media accounts, which are awash with adoring posts about Trump, feature recent updates that were tagged as having been posted from Trump Winery, Trump Tower and the White House. #TrumpPlant "GENE HUBER" Visited WH on Feb 11, among other visits to Trump properties. Received call from Trump on 2.14. pic.twitter.com/lzyTV0AaGE ‚Äî People V. Trump (@Not45Th) February 19, 2017 
M oreover, in a Facebook post on February 14th, Mr Huber claimed to have received a telephone call from the president: A post from Mr Huber's Facebook page Credit: Gene Huber/Facebook
